text: Nthawi ya Hajji ili ndi miyezi yake yodziwika. Aliyense amene afuna kupanga Hajji mâ€™menemu sayenera kugona ndi mkazi wake kapena kuchitazoipakapenakukanganandianzakenthawiya Hajji. Ndipo chabwino chilichonse chimene muchita, Mulungu amachidziwa. Mutenge kamba wa paulendo, koma kamba wabwino ndi kuopa Mulungu. Motero ndiopeni Ine, inu anthu ozindikira
